inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: presents to the emergency room with hyperglycemia and concern for possible diabetic ketoacidemia

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: lab studies showed: Aspartate aminotransferase (AST): 17 U/L, Alanine aminotransferase (ALT): 14 U/L

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: lab studies showed: Creatinine: 0.9 mg/dL with eGFR >60 mL/min

notes: The patient reports that he is currently homeless and has lost his supply of insulin, syringes, glucometer, and glucose testing supplies.
